plot: How the events of WW 2 affected various members of a lower middle class family in Liverpool, the emphasis being on life on the home front.
plot_en: How the events of WW 2 affected various members of a lower middle class family in Liverpool, the emphasis being on life on the home front.
plot_es: How the events of WW 2 affected various members of a lower middle class family in Liverpool, the emphasis being on life on the home front.
title: A Family at War
